posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tim Sanders
I am plodding away at my T206 set and trying to complete the Cubs team as a side project. I'm having difficulty finding Needham and Zimmerman and would like to buy them or trade other T206's that I have for them. I don't care about back types and would really like to stick to raw or SGC A, 10, 20, or 30.  Please let me know if you can help.
